name: Catch My Tail
description:
*Can be only played in Window*

Game Description:

Our game is called Catch My Tail, and it is inspired by an Asian traditional folk game. made into a 3D multiplayer online game. players need to run away from their killers, or look for their intended targets and kill them. The last survivor will win the game.

Team Members:

Game designer: Juhee Kong, Zac Bogner

Artists and Engineers: Hope, Christian, Amber, Laura, Fernando, Daniel
Niki, Rhen, Kellen, Kim, Yuval, Melissa, Yongxi,
Kara, Lucia, Mikyung, Alice, Emma, Kat
